Summary Note:
The RM first met Michiels Sanders Peters at a luxury car show in Brussels. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
Michiels Sanders Peters is a seasoned professional with over 33 years of experience.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.

Occupation History:
Michiels Sanders Peters is a seasoned professional with over 33 years of experience.
In 1992, Michiels Sanders Peters started working as a Research Scientist at Takeda Pharmaceuticals Belgium, marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 1996, he moved to Takeda Pharmaceuticals Belgium to work as a Biotech Startup Founder, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
At Galapagos NV, he worked as a CEO from 2003 to 2023, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 730000 EUR.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 1386000 EUR.

In 2006, he received an inheritance of 5900000 EUR from his late father, who was a prominent Tech Entrepreneur, and has since invested it in various assets.
